item.title: Data from: Density-dependent positive feedbacks buffer aquatic plants from interactive effects of eutrophication and predator loss
item.description: Sources Summary Caveats Set up Import data cleaning Reproducibility Appendix S5 Table S1 reproducing epiphytic algae biomass columns in-text Appendix S5 Table S2 Figure 2 Statistical Red-flags Figure red-flags Simulate this Sources Source: Donadi S, Austin ÅN, Svartgren E, Eriksson BK, Hansen JP, Eklöf JS (2018) Density-dependent positive feedbacks buffer aquatic plants from interactive effects of eutrophication and predator loss. Ecology 99(11): 2515-2524.

item.title: Data from: Litter removal in a tropical rain forest reduces fine root biomass and production but litter addition has few effects
item.description: Sources Summary Caveats Set up Functions import Note in file Data inconsistencies Data pre-processing Reproducibility Section: Fine root mass and production My ANOVA results reported ANOVA results Did the authors use a one way ANOVA with no random effects? Figure 1 post-hoc tests for fig 1 Fine root mass production effects of treatment on FRB and FRB production figure 2 Section: Fine root length: standing crop, production and survivorship table 1 Figure 3 post hoc tests for fig.

item.title: Data from: Frequency of virus-resistant hosts determines experimental community dynamics
